name: misojs

scripts.development: touch -t 197804100000.00 system/main.js && nodemon -e js,css,json --watch package.json --watch modules/ --ignore 'modules/api/*/api.*.js' --watch system/ --ignore 'system/api/*/api.*.js' --ignore 'system/main.js' --watch cfg/ --watch mvc/ --ignore mvc/model/*.generated.js --watch client/ --watch server/ --watch app.js app.js
scripts.developmentforever: touch -t 197804100000.00 system/main.js && nodemon --exitcrash -e js,css,json --watch package.json --watch modules/ --ignore 'modules/api/*/api.*.js' --watch system/ --ignore 'system/api/*/api.*.js' --ignore 'system/main.js' --watch cfg/ --watch mvc/ --ignore mvc/model/*.generated.js --watch client/ --watch server/ --watch app.js app.js

description: MISOJS (Mithril ISOmorphic JavaScript) is a node.js and mithril based MVC implementation that provides an isomorphic environment to create apps quickly.
author: Mikkel Bergmann
